input: Show all sales order header IDs
query: SELECT header_id FROM PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS ORDER BY header_id;

input: Show sales orders linked to quotation lines
query: SELECT header_id, quotation_line_id, quotation_number FROM PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS WHERE quotation_line_id IS NOT NULL;

input: Find sales orders by quotation number
query: SELECT header_id, quotation_number, customer_id, creation_date FROM PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS WHERE quotation_number = 'QT-12345';

input: Show sales orders created from quotations within date range
query: SELECT header_id, quotation_number, quotation_date, creation_date FROM PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS WHERE quotation_date BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-12-31';

input: Find sales orders by enquiry ID
query: SELECT header_id, enquiry_id, customer_id, creation_date FROM PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS WHERE enquiry_id = 'ENQ-78901';

query: SELECT header_id, trans_type_id, trans_type_name, customer_id FROM PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS WHERE trans_type_id = 1;

input: Show sales orders by transaction sub-type
query: SELECT header_id, trans_sub_type_id, trans_type_id, customer_id FROM PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS WHERE trans_sub_type_id = 2;

input: Show sales orders by shipping site

input: Show sales orders by quote status
query: SELECT header_id, quote_status_id, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS WHERE quote_status_id = 3;

input: Find sales orders with valid quotations
query: SELECT header_id, quotation_number, quotation_valid_upto, customer_id FROM PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS WHERE quotation_valid_upto >= GETDATE();

input: Show back-to-back sales orders
query: SELECT header_id, is_back_to_back_order, customer_id, creation_date FROM PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS WHERE is_back_to_back_order = 1;

query: SELECT header_id, customer_po_date, customer_po_ref, customer_id FROM PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS WHERE customer_po_date BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-06-30';

query: SELECT header_id, bank_id, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE bank_id = 5;

input: Show quotations by agent ID
query: SELECT header_id, agent_id, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE agent_id = 10;

input: Find quotations with commission value
query: SELECT header_id, commission_value, quotation_number, total_value FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE commission_value > 0;

input: Show quotations with export remarks
query: SELECT header_id, export_remarks, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE export_remarks IS NOT NULL;

input: Find quotations by billing division
query: SELECT header_id, billing_devision_id, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE billing_devision_id = 3;

input: Show quotations by conversion rate date
query: SELECT header_id, conversion_rate_date, conversion_rate, currency_type FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE conversion_rate_date = '2024-03-15';

input: Find quotations by conversion type
query: SELECT header_id, conversion_type, conversion_rate, currency_type FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE conversion_type = 'MANUAL';

input: Show quotations by price list ID
query: SELECT header_id, price_list_id, price_list, quotation_number FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE price_list_id = 10;

input: Find quotations by price list
query: SELECT header_id, price_list, price_list_id, quotation_number FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE price_list = 'STANDARD_EXPORT';

input: Show quotations with delivery description
query: SELECT header_id, delivery_description, quotation_number, delivery_terms FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE delivery_description IS NOT NULL;

input: Find quotations where PDF was sent
query: SELECT header_id, is_pdf_sent, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE is_pdf_sent = 1;

input: Show quotations by close status
query: SELECT header_id, close_status_id, quotation_number, status_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE close_status_id = 3;

input: Find quotations by customer header ID
query: SELECT header_id, customer_hdr_id, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE customer_hdr_id = 1000;

input: Show pre-quotations
query: SELECT header_id, is_prequote, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE is_prequote = 1;

input: Find quotations by customer name
query: SELECT header_id, customer_name, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE customer_name LIKE '%ABC Corp%';

input: Show quotations by MC code
query: SELECT header_id, mc_code, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE mc_code = 'MC-001';

input: Find quotations by pre-quote ID
query: SELECT header_id, pre_quote_id, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE pre_quote_id IS NOT NULL;

input: Show quotations with customer approval
query: SELECT header_id, is_customer_approval, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE is_customer_approval = 1;

input: Find quotations with customer refer-back
query: SELECT header_id, is_customer_referback, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE is_customer_referback = 1;

input: Show quotations with customer rejection
query: SELECT header_id, is_customer_reject, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE is_customer_reject = 1;

input: Find quotations with other collector BM mail sent
query: SELECT header_id, othercollectorBM_mailsentflag, quotation_number, collector_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE othercollectorBM_mailsentflag = 1;

input: Show quotations by revision count
query: SELECT header_id, revised_count, quotation_number, creation_date FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE revised_count > 0;

input: Find quotations by RMA header ID
query: SELECT header_id, rma_hdr_id, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE rma_hdr_id IS NOT NULL;

input: Show copied quotations
query: SELECT header_id, copy_quote_id, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE copy_quote_id IS NOT NULL;

input: Find quotations by customer contact request header
query: SELECT header_id, customer_contact_request_hdr_id, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE customer_contact_request_hdr_id IS NOT NULL;

input: Show quotations by customer email ID
query: SELECT header_id, cus_mail_id, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE cus_mail_id IS NOT NULL;

input: Find quotations by user MC code
query: SELECT header_id, user_mc_code, quotation_number, created_by FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE user_mc_code = 'UMC-001';

input: Show cross-market circle segment quotations
query: SELECT header_id, crossmarketcircle_segmentflag, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE crossmarketcircle_segmentflag = 1;

input: Find quotations by internal parent quotation
query: SELECT header_id, internal_parent_quotation_id, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE internal_parent_quotation_id IS NOT NULL;

input: Show quotations by refer-back user
query: SELECT header_id, referback_user_id, quotation_number, status_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE referback_user_id IS NOT NULL;

input: Find quotations by refer-back previous status
query: SELECT header_id, referback_prev_status, quotation_number, status_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE referback_prev_status IS NOT NULL;

input: Show quotations with edit access
query: SELECT header_id, is_edit_access, quotation_number, created_by FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE is_edit_access = 1;

input: Find quotations by sample lead ID
query: SELECT header_id, sample_lead_id, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE sample_lead_id IS NOT NULL;

input: Show quotations by verification status
query: SELECT header_id, Verify_StatusId, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE Verify_StatusId = 2;

input: Find quotations with verification comments
query: SELECT header_id, Verify_Comments, quotation_number, Verify_StatusId FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE Verify_Comments IS NOT NULL;

input: Show quotations by verification reasons
query: SELECT header_id, Verify_Reasons, quotation_number, Verify_StatusId FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE Verify_Reasons IS NOT NULL;

input: Find quotations with item-level edits
query: SELECT header_id, is_Itemlevel_edited, quotation_number, revised_count FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE is_Itemlevel_edited = 1;

input: Show quotations with PO-level edits
query: SELECT header_id, is_POlevel_edited, quotation_number, revised_count FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE is_POlevel_edited = 1;

input: Find quotations by DMS header ID
query: SELECT header_id, DmsHdrId, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE DmsHdrId = 5001;

input: Show walk-in quotations
query: SELECT header_id, is_Walkin_quote, quotation_number, customer_id FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS WHERE is_Walkin_quote = 1;

input: Show all sales orders with their line items and total values
query: SELECT h.header_id, h.quotation_number, h.customer_id, h.creation_date as order_date, d.line_id, d.item_id, d.quantity, d.unit_price, d.total_sales_price FROM PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS h INNER JOIN PONPURE_SALEORDERDTLS d ON h.header_id = d.header_id ORDER BY h.creation_date DESC, h.header_id, d.line_id;

input: Find quotations that converted to sales orders and their conversion timeline
query: SELECT q.header_id as quote_id, q.quotation_number, q.quotation_date, h.header_id as order_id, h.creation_date as order_date, DATEDIFF(day, q.quotation_date, h.creation_date) as days_to_convert FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS q LEFT OUTER JOIN PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS h ON q.quotation_number = h.quotation_number WHERE h.header_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY q.quotation_date DESC;

input: Calculate total sales value by customer from all sales orders
query: SELECT h.customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT h.header_id) as order_count, SUM(d.total_sales_price) as total_sales_value, AVG(d.total_sales_price) as avg_order_value FROM PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS h INNER JOIN PONPURE_SALEORDERDTLS d ON h.header_id = d.header_id GROUP BY h.customer_id ORDER BY total_sales_value DESC;

input: Show pending quotations that haven't converted to sales orders
query: SELECT q.header_id, q.quotation_number, q.customer_id, q.quotation_date, q.quotation_valid_upto, q.status_id, q.total_value FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS q LEFT OUTER JOIN PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS h ON q.quotation_number = h.quotation_number WHERE h.header_id IS NULL AND q.status_id IN (1, 2) AND q.quotation_valid_upto >= GETDATE() ORDER BY q.quotation_valid_upto ASC;

input: Find sales order details with their originating quotation information
query: SELECT h.header_id as order_id, h.quotation_number, q.header_id as quote_id, q.quotation_date, q.quotation_valid_upto, d.line_id, d.item_id, d.quantity, d.unit_price, d.total_sales_price FROM PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS h INNER JOIN PONPURE_SALEORDERDTLS d ON h.header_id = d.header_id LEFT OUTER JOIN PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS q ON h.quotation_number = q.quotation_number WHERE h.quotation_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY h.creation_date DESC;

input: Show monthly sales performance with item details
query: SELECT FORMAT(h.creation_date, 'yyyy-MM') as month, h.trans_type_name, d.item_id, SUM(d.quantity) as total_quantity, SUM(d.total_sales_price) as total_revenue, AVG(d.unit_price) as avg_unit_price FROM PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS h INNER JOIN PONPURE_SALEORDERDTLS d ON h.header_id = d.header_id WHERE h.creation_date >= DATEADD(month, -6, GETDATE()) GROUP BY FORMAT(h.creation_date, 'yyyy-MM'), h.trans_type_name, d.item_id ORDER BY month DESC, total_revenue DESC;

input: Find top selling products with customer and quotation details
query: SELECT d.item_id, SUM(d.quantity) as total_quantity_sold, SUM(d.total_sales_price) as total_revenue, COUNT(DISTINCT h.header_id) as order_count, COUNT(DISTINCT h.customer_id) as customer_count, COUNT(DISTINCT q.header_id) as quotation_count FROM PONPURE_SALEORDERDTLS d INNER JOIN PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS h ON d.header_id = h.header_id LEFT OUTER JOIN PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS q ON h.quotation_number = q.quotation_number GROUP BY d.item_id ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;

input: Show quotation conversion rates by salesperson/collector
query: SELECT q.collector_id, COUNT(q.header_id) as total_quotations, COUNT(h.header_id) as converted_orders, CASE WHEN COUNT(q.header_id) > 0 THEN CAST(COUNT(h.header_id) * 100.0 / COUNT(q.header_id) AS DECIMAL(5,2)) ELSE 0 END as conversion_rate_percent, SUM(q.total_value) as quoted_value, SUM(h.total_order_value) as converted_value FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS q LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT quotation_number, COUNT(*) as order_count, SUM(order_total) as total_order_value FROM PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS GROUP BY quotation_number) h ON q.quotation_number = h.quotation_number WHERE q.collector_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY q.collector_id ORDER BY conversion_rate_percent DESC;

input: Find sales orders with delivery commitments and item details
query: SELECT h.header_id, h.customer_id, h.customer_po_ref, d.line_id, d.item_id, d.quantity, d.delivery_date, d.packing_details, d.drum_type, d.freight_terms_id FROM PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS h INNER JOIN PONPURE_SALEORDERDTLS d ON h.header_id = d.header_id WHERE d.delivery_date BETWEEN GETDATE() AND DATEADD(day, 30, GETDATE()) ORDER BY d.delivery_date ASC, h.header_id;

input: Show export transactions with complete logistics details
query: SELECT q.header_id as quote_id, q.quotation_number, q.export_contractno, q.port_loading_id, q.port_discharge_id, h.header_id as order_id, h.creation_date as order_date, d.item_id, d.quantity, d.total_sales_price, d.tax_percentage FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS q LEFT OUTER JOIN PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS h ON q.quotation_number = h.quotation_number LEFT OUTER JOIN PONPURE_SALEORDERDTLS d ON h.header_id = d.header_id WHERE q.trans_type_name = 'EXPORT' AND q.export_contractno IS NOT NULL ORDER BY q.quotation_date DESC;

input: Calculate average discount by customer category
query: SELECT h.customer_id, COUNT(d.line_id) as line_item_count, AVG(d.discount_percentage) as avg_discount_percent, SUM(d.discount_value) as total_discount_value, SUM(d.total_sales_price) as total_sales_value FROM PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS h INNER JOIN PONPURE_SALEORDERDTLS d ON h.header_id = d.header_id WHERE d.discount_percentage > 0 GROUP BY h.customer_id HAVING COUNT(d.line_id) >= 5 ORDER BY avg_discount_percent DESC;

input: Find back-to-back orders with their quotation and item details
query: SELECT h.header_id, h.quotation_number, h.is_back_to_back_order, q.header_id as quote_id, q.total_value as quoted_value, d.item_id, d.quantity, d.unit_price, d.total_sales_price, d.internal_source_flag, d.internal_source_invorg_id FROM PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS h INNER JOIN PONPURE_SALEORDERDTLS d ON h.header_id = d.header_id LEFT OUTER JOIN PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS q ON h.quotation_number = q.quotation_number WHERE h.is_back_to_back_order = 1 ORDER BY h.creation_date DESC;

input: Show quotation to order pipeline with aging analysis
query: SELECT CASE WHEN h.header_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'Converted to Order' WHEN q.quotation_valid_upto < GETDATE() THEN 'Expired' WHEN q.status_id = 3 THEN 'Rejected' ELSE 'Pending' END as pipeline_status, COUNT(q.header_id) as count, AVG(DATEDIFF(day, q.quotation_date, GETDATE())) as avg_days_in_status, SUM(q.total_value) as total_quoted_value FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS q LEFT OUTER JOIN PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS h ON q.quotation_number = h.quotation_number GROUP BY CASE WHEN h.header_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'Converted to Order' WHEN q.quotation_valid_upto < GETDATE() THEN 'Expired' WHEN q.status_id = 3 THEN 'Rejected' ELSE 'Pending' END ORDER BY count DESC;

input: Find sales orders with tax calculations and HSN codes
query: SELECT h.header_id, h.customer_id, h.creation_date, d.line_id, d.item_id, d.item_hsn_code, d.quantity, d.unit_price, d.total_sales_price, d.tax_percentage, d.total_sales_price * d.tax_percentage / 100 as tax_amount, d.total_sales_price + (d.total_sales_price * d.tax_percentage / 100) as total_with_tax FROM PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS h INNER JOIN PONPURE_SALEORDERDTLS d ON h.header_id = d.header_id WHERE d.tax_percentage > 0 AND d.item_hsn_code IS NOT NULL ORDER BY h.creation_date DESC;

input: Show quotation approval analysis with order conversion
query: SELECT q.approval_status_id, COUNT(q.header_id) as total_quotations, COUNT(h.header_id) as converted_orders, AVG(DATEDIFF(day, q.quotation_date, q.approval_received_date)) as avg_approval_days, AVG(q.total_value) as avg_quoted_value, SUM(q.total_value) as total_quoted_value FROM PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS q LEFT OUTER JOIN PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS h ON q.quotation_number = h.quotation_number WHERE q.approval_status_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY q.approval_status_id ORDER BY q.approval_status_id;

input: Find recurring customers with their order history
query: SELECT h.customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT h.header_id) as total_orders, MIN(h.creation_date) as first_order_date, MAX(h.creation_date) as last_order_date, SUM(d.total_sales_price) as lifetime_value, COUNT(DISTINCT q.header_id) as total_quotations FROM PONPURE_SALEORDERHDRS h INNER JOIN PONPURE_SALEORDERDTLS d ON h.header_id = d.header_id LEFT OUTER JOIN PONPURE_QUOTATIONHDRS q ON h.quotation_number = q.quotation_number GROUP BY h.customer_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT h.header_id) >= 3 ORDER BY lifetime_value DESC;

input: Show all schedule IDs with their sales order header and line details
query: SELECT s.line_id AS schedule_id, s.sale_order_header_id, s.sale_order_detail_line_id, h.order_date, h.customer_name, d.item_description, s.schedule_quantity, s.schedule_date FROM Ponpure_Schedules s INNER JOIN Ponpure_SaleOrderHdrs h ON s.sale_order_header_id = h.header_id INNER JOIN Ponpure_SaleOrderdtls d ON s.sale_order_detail_line_id = d.line_id ORDER BY s.line_id;

input: Find schedules with pending status and their order details
query: SELECT s.line_id, s.schedule_status_id, s.schedule_date, s.schedule_quantity, h.order_number, h.order_date, c.customer_name FROM Ponpure_Schedules s INNER JOIN Ponpure_SaleOrderHdrs h ON s.sale_order_header_id = h.header_id INNER JOIN Customers c ON h.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE s.schedule_status_id = 1 ORDER BY s.schedule_date;

input: Show scheduled deliveries by item group with quantities
query: SELECT s.item_group, COUNT(*) as total_schedules, SUM(s.schedule_quantity) as total_quantity, SUM(s.order_quantity) as total_ordered FROM Ponpure_Schedules s GROUP BY s.item_group ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;

input: Find rescheduled deliveries with reasons
query: SELECT s.line_id, s.schedule_date, s.reschedule_date, s.reschedule_reason, s.customer_requested_date, h.order_number, c.customer_name FROM Ponpure_Schedules s INNER JOIN Ponpure_SaleOrderHdrs h ON s.sale_order_header_id = h.header_id INNER JOIN Customers c ON h.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE s.reschedule_date IS NOT NULL AND s.reschedule_date != s.schedule_date ORDER BY s.reschedule_date;

input: Show dispatched deliveries with actual vs scheduled dates
query: SELECT s.line_id, s.schedule_date, s.dispatched_date, s.dispatched_quantity, s.schedule_quantity, h.order_number, s.inventory_org_name FROM Ponpure_Schedules s INNER JOIN Ponpure_SaleOrderHdrs h ON s.sale_order_header_id = h.header_id WHERE s.dispatched_date IS NOT NULL AND s.dispatched_quantity > 0 ORDER BY s.dispatched_date DESC;

input: Find schedules by inventory organization
query: SELECT s.inventory_org_id, s.inventory_org_name, COUNT(*) as schedule_count, SUM(s.schedule_quantity) as total_quantity, AVG(s.unit_price) as avg_unit_price FROM Ponpure_Schedules s GROUP BY s.inventory_org_id, s.inventory_org_name ORDER BY schedule_count DESC;

input: Show schedules with packing details and costs
query: SELECT s.line_id, s.item_id, s.packing_size, s.packing_details, s.packing_cost, s.drum_type, s.schedule_quantity, s.item_group FROM Ponpure_Schedules s WHERE s.packing_size IS NOT NULL OR s.packing_details IS NOT NULL ORDER BY s.packing_cost DESC;

input: Find schedules linked to quotations
query: SELECT s.line_id, s.quotation_no, s.sale_order_header_id, h.order_number, h.order_date, q.quotation_date, q.status as quotation_status FROM Ponpure_Schedules s INNER JOIN Ponpure_SaleOrderHdrs h ON s.sale_order_header_id = h.header_id LEFT JOIN Ponpure_QuotationHdrs q ON s.quotation_no = q.quotation_number WHERE s.quotation_no IS NOT NULL ORDER BY q.quotation_date;

input: Show delivery schedules by customer with shipping details
query: SELECT s.customer_id, c.customer_name, s.bill_to_customer_site_id, s.ship_to_customer_site_id, s.frieght_term_id, s.schedule_date, s.schedule_quantity, s.item_group FROM Ponpure_Schedules s INNER JOIN Customers c ON s.customer_id = c.customer_id ORDER BY s.customer_id, s.schedule_date;

input: Find schedules with special handling requirements
query: SELECT s.line_id, s.sale_category, s.reason_id, s.comments, s.backtoback_enable, s.is_recall, h.order_number, s.schedule_status_id FROM Ponpure_Schedules s INNER JOIN Ponpure_SaleOrderHdrs h ON s.sale_order_header_id = h.header_id WHERE s.reason_id != 0 OR s.comments IS NOT NULL OR s.backtoback_enable = 1 OR s.is_recall = 1 ORDER BY s.line_id;

input: Show schedules by payment terms
query: SELECT s.payment_term_id, pt.term_name, COUNT(*) as schedule_count, SUM(s.schedule_quantity * s.unit_price) as total_value FROM Ponpure_Schedules s LEFT JOIN Payment_Terms pt ON s.payment_term_id = pt.term_id GROUP BY s.payment_term_id, pt.term_name ORDER BY total_value DESC;

input: Find schedules with internal source flags
query: SELECT s.line_id, s.internal_source_flag, s.internal_source_invorg_id, s.internal_child_schedule_id, s.internal_parent_schedule_id, s.request_type, h.order_number FROM Ponpure_Schedules s INNER JOIN Ponpure_SaleOrderHdrs h ON s.sale_order_header_id = h.header_id WHERE s.internal_source_flag = 1 ORDER BY s.internal_parent_schedule_id;

input: Show schedules created or updated by specific users
query: SELECT s.line_id, s.created_by, u1.username as created_by_name, s.creation_date, s.last_updated_by, u2.username as updated_by_name, s.last_update_date, h.order_number FROM Ponpure_Schedules s INNER JOIN Ponpure_SaleOrderHdrs h ON s.sale_order_header_id = h.header_id LEFT JOIN Users u1 ON s.created_by = u1.user_id LEFT JOIN Users u2 ON s.last_updated_by = u2.user_id ORDER BY s.last_update_date DESC;

input: Find schedules with Unicommerce integration data
query: SELECT s.line_id, s.unicommerce_sale_order_item_ids, s.unicommerce_validation_error_message, s.is_mobile_request, h.order_number, s.schedule_status_id FROM Ponpure_Schedules s INNER JOIN Ponpure_SaleOrderHdrs h ON s.sale_order_header_id = h.header_id WHERE s.unicommerce_sale_order_item_ids IS NOT NULL OR s.is_mobile_request = 1 ORDER BY s.line_id;

input: Show schedules with delivery time windows
query: SELECT s.line_id, s.schedule_time, s.dispatched_time, s.schedule_date, s.dispatched_date, h.order_number, c.customer_name, s.ship_to_customer_site_id FROM Ponpure_Schedules s INNER JOIN Ponpure_SaleOrderHdrs h ON s.sale_order_header_id = h.header_id INNER JOIN Customers c ON h.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE s.schedule_time IS NOT NULL ORDER BY s.schedule_date, s.schedule_time;

input: Find schedules by sale category with financial details
query: SELECT s.sale_category, COUNT(*) as total_schedules, SUM(s.schedule_quantity) as total_quantity, SUM(s.schedule_quantity * s.unit_price) as total_value, AVG(s.unit_price) as avg_price, AVG(s.tax) as avg_tax FROM Ponpure_Schedules s GROUP BY s.sale_category ORDER BY total_value DESC;

input: Show schedules with alternate items
query: SELECT s.line_id, s.item_id, s.alternate_item_id, i1.item_name as original_item, i2.item_name as alternate_item, s.schedule_quantity, h.order_number FROM Ponpure_Schedules s INNER JOIN Ponpure_SaleOrderHdrs h ON s.sale_order_header_id = h.header_id LEFT JOIN Items i1 ON s.item_id = i1.item_id LEFT JOIN Items i2 ON s.alternate_item_id = i2.item_id WHERE s.alternate_item_id IS NOT NULL AND s.alternate_item_id != s.item_id ORDER BY s.line_id;

input: Find schedules with previous schedule quantities
query: SELECT s.line_id, s.previous_schedule_quantity, s.schedule_quantity, s.order_quantity, h.order_number, s.schedule_date, s.reschedule_date FROM Ponpure_Schedules s INNER JOIN Ponpure_SaleOrderHdrs h ON s.sale_order_header_id = h.header_id WHERE s.previous_schedule_quantity IS NOT NULL ORDER BY s.line_id;

input: Show schedules by agreed delivery days
query: SELECT s.agreeddays, COUNT(*) as schedule_count, AVG(DATEDIFF(day, h.order_date, s.schedule_date)) as actual_days, h.order_date, s.schedule_date FROM Ponpure_Schedules s INNER JOIN Ponpure_SaleOrderHdrs h ON s.sale_order_header_id = h.header_id GROUP BY s.agreeddays, h.order_date, s.schedule_date ORDER BY s.agreeddays;

input: Find schedules with approval status details
query: SELECT s.line_id, s.schedule_approval_status_id, a.status_name as approval_status, s.confirm_status_id, c.status_name as confirm_status, s.soc_status_id, h.order_number FROM Ponpure_Schedules s INNER JOIN Ponpure_SaleOrderHdrs h ON s.sale_order_header_id = h.header_id LEFT JOIN Approval_Statuses a ON s.schedule_approval_status_id = a.status_id LEFT JOIN Confirm_Statuses c ON s.confirm_status_id = c.status_id ORDER BY s.schedule_approval_status_id;

input: Show all lead IDs
query: SELECT lead_id FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails ORDER BY lead_id;

input: Show lead details with customer names
query: SELECT lead_id, customername, industry, user_branch FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails ORDER BY lead_id;

input: Show leads by industry
query: SELECT lead_id, customername, industry, user_branch FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails WHERE industry = 'PHARMA' ORDER BY customername;

input: Show leads by branch
query: SELECT lead_id, customername, industry, user_branch FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails WHERE user_branch = 'COIMBATORE' ORDER BY lead_id;

input: Show converted leads
query: SELECT lead_id, customername, industry, converted FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails WHERE converted = TRUE ORDER BY lead_id;

input: Show non-converted leads
query: SELECT lead_id, customername, industry, converted FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails WHERE converted = FALSE ORDER BY lead_id;

input: Show leads with email addresses
query: SELECT lead_id, customername, email_id, industry FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails WHERE email_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customername;

input: Show leads by status
query: SELECT lead_id, customername, leadstatus, leadsource FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails WHERE leadstatus = 7 ORDER BY lead_id;

input: Show rejected leads
query: SELECT lead_id, customername, lead_close_status, lead_close_option FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails WHERE lead_close_status = 'Rejected' ORDER BY lead_id;

input: Show leads with comments
query: SELECT lead_id, customername, comments FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails WHERE comments IS NOT NULL ORDER BY lead_id;

input: Show leads by business type
query: SELECT lead_id, customername, business_type, industry FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails WHERE business_type = 'PRIVATE LIMITED' ORDER BY customername;

input: Show leads with competitor information
query: SELECT lead_id, customername, comp_name, comp_prod_category, comp_price FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails WHERE comp_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY comp_name;

input: Show leads created by specific user
query: SELECT lead_id, customername, created_by, creation_date FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails WHERE created_by = 158 ORDER BY creation_date;

input: Show leads with sales type flag
query: SELECT lead_id, customername, sales_type_flag FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails WHERE sales_type_flag = 'R' ORDER BY lead_id;

input: Show leads by segment
query: SELECT lead_id, customername, segment1, industry FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails WHERE segment1 = 'Performance Chemicals' ORDER BY customername;

input: Show leads with referral information
query: SELECT lead_id, customername, referral_customer_number, referral_customer_name FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails WHERE referral_customer_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY referral_customer_number;

input: Show leads by market circle
query: SELECT lead_id, customername, user_mc_code, user_branch FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails WHERE user_mc_code = 'COI02' ORDER BY lead_id;

input: Show leads with cross market access
query: SELECT lead_id, customername, cross_marketcircle_segmentaccess_flag FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails WHERE cross_marketcircle_segmentaccess_flag = TRUE ORDER BY lead_id;

input: Show leads with credit evaluation
query: SELECT lead_id, customername, is_credit_evaluated FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails WHERE is_credit_evaluated = TRUE ORDER BY lead_id;

input: Show leads with approval status
query: SELECT lead_id, customername, approve_status, approval_date FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails WHERE approve_status = 1 ORDER BY approval_date;

input: Show leads joined with sales orders
query: SELECT l.lead_id, l.customername, l.industry, s.header_id, s.order_date FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails l LEFT JOIN Ponpure_SaleOrderHdrs s ON l.customer_id = s.customer_id WHERE s.header_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY l.lead_id;

input: Show leads without sales orders
query: SELECT l.lead_id, l.customername, l.industry, l.converted FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails l LEFT JOIN Ponpure_SaleOrderHdrs s ON l.customer_id = s.customer_id WHERE s.header_id IS NULL ORDER BY l.lead_id;

input: Show leads with sales order details
query: SELECT l.lead_id, l.customername, l.industry, s.header_id, so.line_id, so.item_code FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails l LEFT JOIN Ponpure_SaleOrderHdrs s ON l.customer_id = s.customer_id LEFT JOIN Ponpure_SaleOrderDtls so ON s.header_id = so.header_id WHERE s.header_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY l.lead_id, so.line_id;

input: Show leads with their latest updates
query: SELECT lead_id, customername, last_updated_by, last_update_date FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails ORDER BY last_update_date DESC;

input: Show leads created in date range
query: SELECT lead_id, customername, creation_date FROM Ponpure_Leaddetails WHERE creation_date >= '2025-10-01' AND creation_date <= '2025-10-31' ORDER BY creation_date;
